name: Experimental 3D Game
description:
Uploaded for the East Coast Game Jam. 

This was my first time really exploring the 3D space. I did a lot of playing around and experimenting. By the time I realized I wouldn't have time to turn what I had into a game, I decided to just keep playing and see where I could go with it. This is weird. You can control it, but it isn't a game. As fun as this was to make, I understand completely if you can't bring yourself to enjoy playing it.

Rain SFX:
"Rain, Moderate, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Background music:
Unsound by Julie Licata
